text:
Also, if you have a strong side-income, you can take more risks with your employment income and pay a very low tax rate.

Sticking £40k into a pension, and then buying a portfolio of VCT funds (30% income tax rebate), can reduce actual income tax to under 10%.

text: I've seen clauses in employee handbooks, which state that you can't gamble during office hours, or even talk about it during office hours. Automated sports betting would be a grey area in terms of such contracts. I once wrote an Android game... mentioned it in a discussion, and was forced to submit it to HR for approval. Since then, I've found it best not to talk too much in the office.

user_profile.real_name: Jon Jon Jon Jon Jon Jon Jon Jon
